summary: Improves some of the default sounds that play when you case a spell. Very slim in size but very noticeable in usage.

[/color][b][color=#a4c2f4][size=4]Alternative versions and download locations:[/size][/color]
[size=2]Released for Skyrim SE on PC ([url=https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/3000802]Bethesda[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11603/?]Nexus[/url])
Released for Skyrim SE on Xbox One ([url=https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/3000799]Bethesda[/url])
Released for Skyrim SE on PS4 ([url=https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/3000795]Bethesda[/url])
Released for Skyrim on PC ([url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12716/?]Nexus[/url])[/size][/b][/font][/b][/center]


[color=#00ffff][size=5]Overview[/size][/color]

[size=3]This mod improves the sound effects associated with magic in Skyrim. The mod does not add any new sound files, but instead makes small edits to the relative volume and frequency of sounds found in-game. The end result is a more immersive and less annoying user experience. 
[/size][size=3]
If you are using a previous version of this mod, please uninstall it and replace it with this version.

This mod works great with Phenderix Magic World.

[/size]
[color=#00ffff][size=5]Updates[/size][/color]

[size=3]None.
[/size]
